short_description: Detox Max helps in inhibiting the absorption of fat and reducing your weight.  Chlorogenic Acid present in this supplement helps in releasing glucose in the body and at the same time increasing metabolism in the liver. This ingredient absorbs fat and helps in losing weight.This process is as important as exercise. With this supplement, fat starts burning automatically, metabolism gets boosted up and also helps in suppressing appetite.  All this process is carried out by generating heat in the body.
